text: It's not too late! Enrollment open now through January 15 for the Spring semester. Classes begin Tuesday, January 21.

Welcome to Donnelly College! At Donnelly you will experience college in a friendly, diverse and supportive environment. You will be encouraged to discover your passion and follow your dreams
. After your application has been processed, you will hear from an admissions counselor about your next steps toward enrollment.
including securing financial aid and applying for scholarships.
- Discuss your goals with an academic advisor and select classes.

Donnelly has an opens admissions policy. However, some programs such as nursing have additional admissions requirements and may be selective. Students who do not have recent ACT scores are assessed through
- Summary of tuition and fees you may incur as a student.
- Learn more about possible loans, grants and scholarships to make college affordable

Donnelly College is a Catholic institution of higher education that seeks to continue the mission of Jesus Christ in our time by making the love of God tangible in our world.

Specifically, the mission of Donnelly College is to provide education and community services with personal concern for the needs and abilities of each student, especially those who might not otherwise be served.
Donnelly College | 608 N. 18th St. | Kansas City, KS | (913) 621-8700 | Copyright © 2017 |
